Name: Homestead
About the game: Grow Crops As you grow more crops, more will become available to you! Raise livestock Take care of cows, chickens, sheep, and more to make money on your mission to save the once bustling town of Layala! Make Friends Meet interesting people around town and develop relationships with them to learn about the area! Go Fishing Catch a variety of fish in the waters around Layala! Get Achievements As you explore and discover the ways of farming, you'll find a number of Steam Exclusive Achievements for doing so! Excitement awaits in this one of a kind Farming RPG!
Meta Title: Homestead: May 4, 2020, Lucas Smith and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Homestead? Check out the release date (May 4, 2020), developer insights from Lucas Smith, and a complete game summary.
